definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: humiliate (NH Hiph., id.; Aram. [[כְּלַם]] Aph. Ithpe.; Ar. kalama is wound; kal=ama also speak to, converse with);—

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pf. 2 fs. [[וְנִכְלַמְתְּ]] consec. Je 22:22 + 2 t.; 1 S. [[נִכְלַמְתִּי]] Je 31:19, Ezr 9:6, [[נִכְלָָמְתִּי]] Is 50:7; 3 pl. [[נִכְלְמוּ]] Is 45:16 + 2 t.; Impf. 3 fs. [[תִּכָּלֵם]] Nu 12:14; 2 fs. [[תִּכָּֽלְמִי]] Is 54:4; 3 mpl. [[יִכָּֽלְמוּ]] Is 41:11 + 5 t.; 2 mpl. [[תִּכָּֽלְמוּ]] Is 45:17; Imv. mpl. [[הִכָּֽלְמוּ]] Ez Eze 36:32; Inf. cstr. [[הִכָּלֵם]] Je 3:3, Je 8:12; Pt. [[נִכְלָם]] Ps 74:21; mpl. [[נִכְלָמִים]] 2Sa 10:5 + 2 t.; fpl. [[נִכְלָמוֹת]] Ez Eze 16:27; —be humiliated, ashamed, put to shame, dishonoured, confounded:

be humiliated, ashamed, before men Nu 12:14 (E), 2Sa 10:5 = 1Ch 19:5, 2Sa 19:4, cf. Ps 74:21; before enemies (by defeat, etc.) Is 45:17 (‖[[בושׁ]]), Is 50:7, Is 54:4 (‖[[בושׁ]], [[חפר]]); before God, sq. [[לְ]] inf., [[וְנִכְלַמְתִּי]] [[אֱלֽהַי לְהָרִים פָּנַי אֵלֶיְ]] Ezr 9:6 (‖[[בושׁ]]); Je 3:3, Ez Eze 16:27, Eze 16:54 (‖[[נׇשָׂא כְלִמָּה]]), Eze 43:10, Eze 43:11 (all + [[מִן]] caus.) Eze 16:61, so prob. Levites, at Hezekiah's reforms 2Ch 30:5.

be put to shame, dishonoured, confounded, by judgments of ´[[י]], all ‖[[בושׁ]]: Je 22:22 ([[מִן]] of cause), Ez Eze 36:32 (id.), Je 31:19 ([[כִּי]] of cause), Je 8:12, Is 41:11, Is 45:16 (+ [[הָלַח בַּכְּלִמָּה]]), Ps 35:4, Ps 69:7; + [[חפר]] Ps 40:15, Ps 70:3.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. sf. [[הִכְּלִמוֹ]] 1Sa 20:34; 3 mpl. sf. [[הֶכְלַמְנוּם]] (Ges:§ 53, 3 R. 6) 1Sa 25:7; Impf. [[יַכְלִים]] Pr 28:7; 2 ms. sf. [[וַתַּכְלִימֵנוּ]] Ps 44:10; 2 mpl. sf. [[תַּכְלִימוּנִי]] Job 19:3, [[־מוּהָ]] Ru 2:15; Inf. cstr. [[הַכְלִים]] Je 6:15, Pr 25:8; Pt. [[מַכְלִים]] Ju Jdg 18:7 (but v. infr.), [[מַכְלִם]] Job 11:3; —

put to shame = insult, humiliate, c. acc. 1Sa 20:34, 1Sa 25:7 (cf. Hoph. v:1Sa 25:15) Ru 2:15, Job 19:3; humiliate by rebuke Job 11:3; humiliate by defeat Pr 25:8, Ps 44:10; cause shame to Pr 28:7; — Ju Jdg 18:7 is crpt. (see Be VB GFM; Be prop. [[מַחְסוֹר כל־דבר]] there was no lack of anything, for MT ´[[מַכְלִים ד]]; GFM conjectures [[מְכַלֵּא]] [[מִדָּבָר]] there is no one to restrain (us) from anything in the land).
1 pl. [[לאׁ הָכְלַמְנוּ]] 1Sa 25:15 we were not insulted, humiliated (cf.
3 pl. [[חָכְלְמוּ]] Je 14:3 they were put to shame, dishonoured, confounded (‖[[בושׁ]]).
